fehd.ADR_TC: 香港銅鑼灣記利佐治街1號金百利商場7樓R3室

result.adr_address: Hong Kong, Causeway Bay, Great George St, 1號金百利廣場7樓R3室
result.formatted_address: Hong Kong, Causeway Bay, Great George St, 1號金百利廣場7樓R3室
result.name: 雲長小龍坎

reviews.text:
First thing you need to do:ready your wallets. We spent 500rmb, for just 5 of us???Small dishes of beefballs, vegetables, etc were wuite overpriced. I wouldn't say that the qualit was even exceptional. They charged us for EVERYTHING, the sesame sauce, the tea, the tissue.
The food itself was pretty good. We ordered the 3 types of soups;plain  spicy and sour, which you can keep asking to be refilled. There was a special promo also while we were there, where we got free beef cubes, but they were really tough.

Good points :
When they say spicy, they mean it.
There are little plastic ziplocks for yiur phone, aprons and hair scrunchies for you in a drawer!
You can order a special gelatin to help you cool off from the spice
The tea was really good
There is a deoderizer outside, which was really cool!
Very nice fishballs, not sure about the rest
Spicy Hotpot ok but not impressive.
Really good but it is overpriced
要境唔錯，檯偏細感覺有d 逼，服務幾好，價錢偏貴，已經冇叫牛肉海鮮，4個人埋單都要成$1400~ 好貴！

result.name: Long Kan Hot Pot

reviews.text: 要境唔錯，檯偏細感覺有d 逼，服務幾好，價錢偏貴，已經冇叫牛肉海鮮，4個人埋單都要成$1400~ 好貴！
味嚟講幾好 裝修精美 價位偏高 中辣湯底唔太食得辣既人會辛苦 不過有鴛鴦湯底 推介俾過時過節或者傾生意既人去 4人埋單$20xx 唔係成日食可以接受

超美味！ 
很地道成都的味道！
湯底： 紅油藥膳鍋
即炸紫菜響鈴😛
成都空運毛肚
手捲牛舌花

雲長小龍坎老火鍋
朋友話呢間麻辣火鍋係明星開嘅，但係四周圍好似好多國內人，原來係全國都有分店，源自成都，由陳柏宇引入到香港。

麻辣湯底配上加入醋嘅醬汁，蘸牛肉來進食，真是非常配合呢，能帶出牛肉的鮮味。

紅油蕃茄窩 $138（鴛鴦湯底 ）
紅油麻辣鍋＋田園蕃茄鍋
辣方面可以揀大中小辣，雖然點算了小辣，但係成都的小辣，絕對不能夠以香港嘅小辣相提並論。個人覺得以香港嘅水平來計，這裏的小辣已是中大辣，一不小心便嗆到喉嚨。另一邊的蕃茄湯底，番茄味濃，除了以小蕃茄熬煮，也加上了茄膏，味道不錯。

極品手切肥牛(小)＄198
油花漂亮，油脂和肉質口感平均，嫩中帶有咬口，肉質與脂肪比例均勻味道極佳。

手卷萵筍片＄58
萵筍切片切得非常薄，每一塊都厚薄均勻，師傅的刀工值得一讚。另外，餐廳選取了較為嫩身的萵筍，一點也沒有渣，值得一讚。

鮮花甲王＄88
花甲王雖然不是太大，不過也非常新鮮。

山藥片＄30
好鍾意用淮山打邊爐，因為健康又養生，其實打邊爐都幾肥，尤其係麻辣嘅湯底，油分好高，所以蔬菜為主嘅邊爐就更加健康。

養生圓肉杞子蘋果茶
用料都幾豐富，每一杯中都有龍眼肉，杞子，仲有蘋果片，侍應姐姐話係餐廳煲的，味道不太甜，清潤又能夠解辣。

茶芥醬料＄25一位

First thing you need to do:ready your wallets. We spent 500rmb, for just 5 of us???Small dishes of beefballs, vegetables, etc were wuite overpriced. I wouldn't say that the qualit was even exceptional. They charged us for EVERYTHING, the sesame sauce, the tea, the tissue.
The food itself was pretty good. We ordered the 3 types of soups;plain  spicy and sour, which you can keep asking to be refilled. There was a special promo also while we were there, where we got free beef cubes, but they were really tough.

Good points :
When they say spicy, they mean it.
There are little plastic ziplocks for yiur phone, aprons and hair scrunchies for you in a drawer!
You can order a special gelatin to help you cool off from the spice
The tea was really good
There is a deoderizer outside, which was really cool!
